tit.e: Tadahide MATSUDAIRA (the heir of Kameyama Domain)
Tadahide MATSUDAIRA (the heir of Kameyama Domain)
Tadahide MATSUDAIRA (the heir of Kameyama Domain)

sen.j: 松平 忠栄（まつだいら ただひで、寛永17年（1640年） － 没年不明）は、江戸時代の人物。
sen.e: Tadahide MATSUDAIRA (1640 - year of death unknown) was active in the Edo period.
Tadahide MATSUDAIRA (1640 - year of death unknown) lived in the Edo period.
Tadahide MATSUDAIRA (1640 - year of death unknown) lived in the Edo period.

sen.j: 丹波国丹波亀山藩の嫡子。
sen.e: He was the heir of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
He was the heir of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
He was the heir of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 播磨国明石藩主・松平忠国 (播磨国明石藩主)の五男。
sen.e: He was the fifth son of Tadakuni MATSUDAIRA (the lord of Akashi Domain, Harima Province).
He was the fifth son of Tadakuni MATSUDAIRA (the lord of Akashi Domain, Harima Province).
He was the fifth son of Tadakuni MATSUDAIRA (the lord of Akashi Domain, Harima Province).
His mother was a daughter of Ujikane TODA.
His mother was a daughter of Ujikane TODA.

sen.j: 官位は従五位下、図書頭。
sen.e: His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Zusho no kami (Director of the Bureau of Drawings and Books).
His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Zusho no kami (Director of the Bureau of Drawings and Books).
His official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Zusho no kami (Director of the Bureau of Drawings and Books).

sen.j: 従兄弟の松平忠俊が早世したため、万治2年（1659年）に叔父で丹波亀山藩主・松平忠晴の養子となる。
sen.e: As his cousin Tadatoshi MATSUDAIRA died at an early age, he became an adopted child of his uncle Tadaharu MATSUDAIRA, the lord of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, in 1659.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: As his cousin Tadatoshi MATSUDAIRA died at an early age, he was adopted to his uncle Tadaharu MATSUDAIRA, the lord of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, in 1659.
As his cousin Tadatoshi MATSUDAIRA died at an early age, he was adopted to his uncle Tadaharu MATSUDAIRA, the lord of Tanba-Kameyama Domain, in 1659.

sen.j: 徳川家綱に初見するが、寛文6年（1666年）に廃嫡された。
sen.e: He met with Ietsuna TOKUGAWA for the first time; however, he was disinherited in 1666.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He met Ietsuna TOKUGAWA and was comfirmed as the successor of the family, however, he was disinherited in 1666.
sen.cmt: 「初見」は、大名家の後嗣が公認される意味を持つので、それを追加しました。
sen.e: He met Ietsuna TOKUGAWA and was comfirmed as the successor of the family, however, he was disinherited in 1666.

sen.j: 代わって、忠晴の次男・松平忠昭 (藤井松平家)が嫡子となり、のち家督を継いだ。
sen.e: Instead of him, Tadaaki MATSUDAIRA (the Fujii-Matsudaira family), the second son of Tadaharu, became the heir and took over as the head of the family.
Instead of him, Tadaaki MATSUDAIRA (the Fujii-Matsudaira family), the second son of Tadaharu, became the heir and took over the family.
sen.cmt: 文末を簡潔にしました。
sen.e: Instead of him, Tadaaki MATSUDAIRA (the Fujii-Matsudaira family), the second son of Tadaharu, became the heir and took over the family.
